mapper.select: SELECT ORDERS_CODE as orderCode, DLVY_STTUS as shippingStatus, DLVY_RECPTR as recipient, DLVY_RECPTR_CTTPC as recipientContact, DLVY_ZIP as zipCode, DLVY_ADRES_RDNM as address, DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL as addressDetail, DLVY_ADRES_PLACE as place, DLVY_ADRES_REQUEST as request FROM DLVY_DETAIL WHERE ORDERS_CODE = #{orderCode} AND CHECK_CHANGE_ADRES = 'N';

select CSTMR_ADRES_ID as addressId, CSTMR_ADRES_ZIP as zipCode, CSTMR_ADRES_RDNMADR as address, CSTMR_ADRES_DETAIL as addressDetail from CSTMR_ADRES where ACNT_ID=#{accountId} AND CSTMR_ADRES_BASS_YN=1;
mapper.insert: insert into DLVY_DETAIL ( ORDERS_ID, ACNT_ID, ORDERS_CODE, DLVY_STTUS, DLVY_RECPTR, DLVY_RECPTR_CTTPC, DLVY_ZIP, DLVY_ADRES_RDNM, DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL, CREATE_DE ) values ( #{orderId}, #{account.accountId}, #{orderCode}, 'ORDER_RECEIVED', #{account.name}, #{account.contact}, #{customerAddress.zipCode}, #{customerAddress.address}, #{customerAddress.addressDetail}, now() );
mapper.update: update DLVY_DETAIL set DLVY_STTUS = #{deliveryStatus}, UPDT_DE = now() where ORDERS_CODE = #{orderCode}
